about_the_game:
Cruzcredo: Become a Legend! is an adventure game where you control Nino, a boy who is nothing but skin and bones tasked with helping the countryside of Casca Dura and becoming its greatest legend. Known for its mysteries and, of course, the famous Giant Egg in its central square, the town is the stage for intriguing tales.

Narrative

In Cruzcredo, you’ll embark on a fun and exciting journey filled with creatures from brazillian fiction and popular mythology, brought to life through urban legends. Your mission is to help the residents of Casca Dura, uncover the secrets surrounding the town, and figure out what — or who — is unleashing so many monsters.

World

Venture through the unique settings of Casca Dura and uncover all its secrets. Find hidden paths, meet fascinating characters inspired by familiar Brazilian archetypes, like the nosy “gossiping aunt” or the remarkable owner of the local bar, and, of course, collect plenty of mythical cruzcredos scattered around!

Brazilian Essence

The game celebrates various aspects of the 1990s while showcasing a rich collection of Brazilian legends, tales, and traditions for you to explore through interactions with Casca Dura’s residents.

Humor

Get ready for engaging, lighthearted dialogues, quirky discussions, clear objectives, and most importantly: guaranteed fun from start to finish!

Mini-Game

Do you like snooker? If so, you're in the right place! Enjoy the snooker mini-game in the famous Moustache bar and become the legendary "King of Pool".

short_description: Rise from the grave and stumble though the streets of Casca Dura, a city buzzing with mysteries, wacky gossip and some good ol' chaos thanks to the "Cruzcredo Curse". Flying rats, a vengeful ghost bride and, oh boy, the skinwalkers... Save Casca Dura from it's doom and become a legend!
